meta.article_title: February 25, 2013 - Should You Hit or Loop the Backhand?

backhand_loop_hit.probleme: Should You Hit or Loop the Backhand?
causes_communes: Beginners should learn to hit first.
Players need good habits early on.

debutant.solution: Learn to hit the backhand first.

intermediaire.solution: Learn to loop against backspin, followed by hitting against an incoming block and rest of rally.

exercices_complementaires.nom: Backhand Loop and Hit One-Two Punch
exercices_complementaires.description: Open with a backhand loop against backspin, followed by backhand hit against an incoming block.

erreurs_a_eviter: Pushing over and over, giving opponent the chance to attack
